page.title: 10Social life
page.content: The population being concentrated in the villages of Fochabers and Mosstodloch the social life of the area is centred there. There are three licensed houses in Fochabers. Possibly the best known is{ The{GORDON ARMS}Hotel which originated as a staging post in the days before mechanised transport and when the River Spey was crossed by ford to the West of the village. The{GRANT ARMS}Hotel also provides accomodation for visitors as well as the usual social areas for the locals. The{RED LION}is the third hostelry and also provides a 'childs bar' where the local youth can socialise in a non-alcoholic environment. With the development of Mosstodloch as a residential area came the opening of the {BEN AIGAN}to provide a meeting place in the evening for locals.
